data.message: I hate that i cant even choose if I want my middle or last name on facebook ugh and why do i have to wait 60 days for it.

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Amanda. We hear your frustration and invite you to contact our team for help with name changes here: http://bit.ly/2dHMJYQ. -Joe
it doesn't show any option to contact anyone, it just shows why i have to wait but nothing else. thanks

Dear Facebook,
I am Achlan from Indonesia. I am working as a social media officer in fb.com/madamaradio. We currently got a grey badge for our page on Facebook but we would like to upgrade it to be a blue badge.

Could please let us know how to upgrade it? Right now, the blue badge request is not available in our country (but some businesses pages and artists has been verified, ex: fb.com/brodoindonesia).

As one of radio station in Makassar, Indonesia. We really hope that our Facebook businesses page could be verified too and our Instagram account as well.

We are looking forward to hearing from you soon. Thank you.
Regards,
Achlan Fahlevi
